data: About Centre College Offices Directory Center for Career & Professional Development Center for Career & Professional Development Office The Center for Career & Professional Development (CCPD) helps students and alumni plan, prepare, and promote their careers. A robust and talented staff of eight work to prepare students for lifelong achievement, including: Guiding students through exploring and choosing careers. Engaging faculty to help students connect the dots between their academic and career development. Connecting students with alumni to help explore career and professional opportunities. Providing students and alumni with the tools and skills needed to achieve success. Offering experiential learning through internships and research to complement classroom understanding. With a Centre degree, support from the Center for Career & Professional Development, and a relentless alumni network working for you, there is no limit to where you can go from here.
